title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table exhibit inconsistent formatting when displayed in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: Datetime values retrieved from the table should display in a consistent format when shown in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1.Retrieve datetime values.
2.Display the values.
3.Display the same values in a data/text item.
4. Observe the difference in formatting between the two.
